elements.text:
You are looking after a friend's child and you're watching TV while they sleep. It's dark outside and you suddenly hear noises against the window. 

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

text: I want to call my friend to have them come home soon, but tell myself that I can face my fear and that the anxiety will go away.
I feel the urge to hide, but tell myself that it was probably nothing outside.
I put on a funny movie.
I decide to play some of my favorite music.
I call my partner and start crying.
